name: [นบ.1] ฟอร์ม ต.1 บันทึกการตรวจสอบ
json:
{"className":"org.joget.apps.form.model.Form","properties":{"noPermissionMessage":"","loadBinder":{"className":"org.joget.apps.form.lib.WorkflowFormBinder","properties":{}},"name":"[นบ.1] ฟอร์ม ต.1 บันทึกการตรวจสอบ","description":"","postProcessorRunOn":"create","permission":{"className":"","properties":{}},"id":"inspectionRecordForNB1","postProcessor":{"className":"","properties":{}},"storeBinder":{"className":"org.joget.apps.form.lib.WorkflowFormBinder","properties":{}},"tableName":"dgr_regis_license"},"elements":[{"elements":[{"elements":[{"className":"org.joget.apps.form.lib.SubForm","properties":{"id":"subReportT1","label":"","formDefId":"inspectionRecord","readonly":"","readonlyLabel":"","noframe":"true","parentSubFormId":"subReportT1","subFormParentId":"parentID","loadBinder":{"className":"org.joget.tutorial.JdbcLoadBinder","properties":{"jdbcDatasource":"default","sql":"SELECT
b.id 
,CASE
    WHEN a.c_subReportT1 <> "" THEN b.c_licenseeFullname 
    ELSE a.c_drillLicenseeFullname
END AS licenseeFullname
,CASE
    WHEN a.c_subReportT1 <> "" THEN b.c_addressNo
    ELSE a.c_addressNo
END AS addressNo
,CASE
    WHEN a.c_subReportT1 <> "" THEN b.c_moo
    ELSE a.c_moo
END AS moo
,CASE
    WHEN a.c_subReportT1 <> "" THEN b.c_soi
    ELSE a.c_soi
END AS soi
,CASE
    WHEN a.c_subReportT1 <> "" THEN b.c_street
    ELSE a.c_street
END AS street
,CASE
    WHEN a.c_subReportT1 <> "" THEN b.c_tambon
    ELSE a.c_tambon
END AS tambon
,CASE
    WHEN a.c_subReportT1 <> "" THEN b.c_amphoe
    ELSE a.c_amphoe
END AS amphoe
,CASE
    WHEN a.c_subReportT1 <> "" THEN b.c_province
    ELSE a.c_province
END AS province
,CASE
    WHEN a.c_subReportT1 <> "" THEN b.c_postalCode
    ELSE a.c_postalCode
END AS postalCode
,CASE
    WHEN a.c_subReportT1 <> "" THEN b.c_phoneNumber
    ELSE a.c_wellPhoneNumber
END AS phoneNumber
,CASE
    WHEN a.c_subReportT1 <> "" THEN b.c_fax
    ELSE a.c_wellFax
END AS fax

,b.c_kmAt AS kmAt
,b.c_actuallyUseWater AS actuallyUseWater
,b.c_additionalNote AS additionalNote
,b.c_amountWaterInLicense AS amountWaterInLicense
,b.c_considerType AS considerType
,b.c_distance AS distance
,b.c_environment AS environment
,b.c_environmentOther AS environmentOther
,b.c_gaugeSize1 AS gaugeSize1
,b.c_gaugeSize2 AS gaugeSize2
,b.c_gaugeSize3 AS gaugeSize3
,b.c_gaugeSize4 AS gaugeSize4
,b.c_gwCondition1 AS gwCondition1
,b.c_gwConditionWell1 AS gwConditionWell1
,b.c_gwCondition2 AS gwCondition2
,b.c_gwCondition3 AS gwCondition3
,b.c_gwCondition4 AS gwCondition4
,b.c_gwConditionWell2 AS gwConditionWell2
,b.c_groundwaterP AS groundwaterP
,b.c_gwProductionCapacity1 AS gwProductionCapacity1
,b.c_gwProductionCapacity2 AS gwProductionCapacity2
,b.c_gwUseCondition1 AS gwUseCondition1
,b.c_gwUseCondition2 AS gwUseCondition2
,b.c_gwUseCondition3 AS gwUseCondition3
,b.c_gwUseCondition4 AS gwUseCondition4
,b.c_gwUseCondition5 AS gwUseCondition5
,b.c_hostName AS hostName
,b.c_hostPosition AS hostPosition
,b.c_hostSignature AS hostSignature
,b.c_impact AS impact
,b.c_impactOther AS impactOther
,b.c_inspectionImage AS inspectionImage
,b.c_inspectionRemark AS inspectionRemark
,b.c_inspectorPosition AS inspectorPosition
,CASE
    WHEN a.c_subReportT1 <> "" THEN b.c_inspectorName
    ELSE "#currentUser.fullName#"
END AS inspectorName
,CASE
    WHEN a.c_subReportT1 <> "" THEN b.c_inspectorSignature
    ELSE "/jw/web/client/app/jusermgnt6/3/form/download/setupUserAdditonal/#currentUser.username#/#form.user_additional.userSignature[{currentUser.username}]#."
END AS inspectorSignature
,CASE
    WHEN a.c_subReportT1 <> "" THEN b.c_location
    ELSE (
        Concat(
            "เลขที่ ",IFNULL(a.c_addressNo, "-")
            ," หมู่ที่ ",IFNULL(a.c_moo,"-")
            ," ตรอก/ซอย ",IFNULL(a.c_soi,"-")
            ," ถนน ",IFNULL(a.c_street,"-")
            ," ตําบล/แขวง ",IFNULL(a.c_tambon,"-")
            ," อําเภอ/เขต ",IFNULL(a.c_amphoe,"-")
            ," จังหวัด ",IFNULL(a.c_province,"-")
            ," รหัสไปรษณีย์ ",IFNULL(a.c_postalCode,"-")
        )
    )
END AS location

,b.c_locationCondition1 AS locationCondition1
,b.c_locationCondition2 AS locationCondition2
,b.c_locationCondition3 AS locationCondition3
,b.c_locationCondition4 AS locationCondition4
,b.c_locationCondition5 AS locationCondition5
,b.c_locationCondition6 AS locationCondition6
,b.c_locationCondition7 AS locationCondition7
,b.c_locationCondition8 AS locationCondition8
,b.c_locationConditionOther AS locationConditionOther
,b.c_locationMapWell AS locationMapWell
,b.c_parentID AS parentID
,b.c_payTapWater1 AS payTapWater1
,b.c_payTapWater2 AS payTapWater2
,b.c_payTapWater3 AS payTapWater3
,b.c_physicalQuality AS physicalQuality
,b.c_processID AS processID
,b.c_reasonNotUseTapWater AS reasonNotUseTapWater
,CASE
    WHEN a.c_subReportT1 <> "" THEN b.c_recordDate
    ELSE "#date.dd/MM/yyyy HH:mm#"
END AS recordDate

,CASE
    WHEN a.c_subReportT1 <> "" THEN b.c_staff1
    ELSE "#currentUser.fullName#"
END AS staff1
,b.c_staff2 AS staff2
,b.c_staff3 AS staff3
,b.c_staff4 AS staff4
,b.c_suitability AS suitability
,b.c_suitabilityReason AS suitabilityReason
,b.c_tapWaterUsage1 AS tapWaterUsage1
,b.c_tapWaterUsage2 AS tapWaterUsage2
,b.c_tapWaterUsage3 AS tapWaterUsage3
,b.c_tapWaterUsage4 AS tapWaterUsage4
,b.c_tapWaterUsage5 AS tapWaterUsage5
,b.c_useTapWater1 AS useTapWater1
,b.c_useTapWater2 AS useTapWater2
,b.c_useTapWater3 AS useTapWater3
,b.c_waterAnalysis AS waterAnalysis
,b.c_waterMeterFee1 AS waterMeterFee1
,b.c_waterMeterFee2 AS waterMeterFee2
,b.c_waterMeterFee3 AS waterMeterFee3
,b.c_waterMeterNumber1 AS waterMeterNumber1
,b.c_waterMeterNumber2 AS waterMeterNumber2
,b.c_waterMeterNumber3 AS waterMeterNumber3
,b.c_waterP AS waterP
,b.c_waterProductionCapacity1 AS waterProductionCapacity1
,b.c_waterProductionCapacity2 AS waterProductionCapacity2
,b.c_waterSupplyAmount AS waterSupplyAmount
,b.c_waterworks AS waterworks
,b.c_waterworksService AS waterworksService
,b.c_waterworksServiceArea AS waterworksServiceArea
,b.c_waterworksServiceAreaOther AS waterworksServiceAreaOther
,b.c_waterworksUse AS waterworksUse
,b.c_witnessName1 AS witnessName1
,b.c_witnessName2 AS witnessName2
,b.c_witnessPosition1 AS witnessPosition1
,b.c_witnessPosition2 AS witnessPosition2
,b.c_witnessSignature1 AS witnessSignature1
,b.c_witnessSignature2 AS witnessSignature2
,CASE 
    WHEN b.c_activityDefID = "locationInspection1" THEN "ตรวจสอบก่อนพิจารณาออกใบอนุญาต"
    WHEN b.c_activityDefID = "locationInspection2" THEN "ตรวจสอบเพิ่มเติมระหว่างพิจารณาระหว่างพิจารณา"
    WHEN b.c_activityDefID = "locationInspection3" THEN "ตรวจสอบหลังพิจารณาออกใบอนุญาต"
 ELSE 'ไม่พบข้อมูล' END AS stepCreate

,CASE 
    WHEN b.id <> "" THEN "no"
 ELSE 'yes' END AS newRec

FROM app_fd_dgr_regis_license AS a
LEFT JOIN app_fd_dgr_inspection AS b
ON a.c_subReportT1 = b.id
WHERE a.id = "#process.recordId#";","autoHandleWorkflowVariable":"true","autoHandleFiles":""}},"storeBinder":{"className":"org.joget.apps.form.lib.WorkflowFormBinder","properties":{}}}}],"className":"org.joget.apps.form.model.Column","properties":{"width":"100%"}}],"className":"org.joget.apps.form.model.Section","properties":{"visibilityControl":"","permissionReadonly":"","permission":{"className":"","properties":{}},"label":"","reverse":"","storeBinder":{"className":"","properties":{}},"visibilityValue":"","regex":"","readonly":"","loadBinder":{"className":"","properties":{}},"comment":"","id":"section1","join":"","readonlyLabel":""}}]}
